articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Syrian Ambassador
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Syrian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, met with Tammam Sulaiman, Syrian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
					 At the meeting the Syrian ambassador conveyed the letter sent to Choe Thae Bok by Hadiyeh Abbas, president of the People's Assembly of Syria, expressing deep thanks for the Korean people's support and solidarity with the just struggle of the Syrian people.
					
					 He said the relations between the two countries are the traditional relations of friendship as they are struggling to accomplish the common cause on the road of independence against imperialism, supporting and cooperating with each other.
					
					 He expressed great admiration at the Korean people who are achieving great successes in the drive for building monumental edifices including construction of Ryomyong Street, creating Mallima speed under the leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greetings from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on January 28.
					 Abbas in the message extended his heartfelt congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the lunar New Year and wished him greater progress and prosperity.
					
					 The message said:
					
					 Regarding the strong and historic ties of friendship between the two countries and peoples as a pride, we affirm that we will further strengthen the relations in the common wellbeing and interests.
					
					 We take this opportunity to highly appreciate your country's steadfast stand of full support and solidarity for our people's all rights and struggle to found an independent state with east Kuds as its capital that serve as sure guarantee for realizing fair peace aspired by all the peoples in our region and making them enjoy the security, stability and neighborly relations.
					
					 The message heartily wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness.

articles.title: New Year Cards to Kim Jong Un from Foreign State and Party Leaders, Personages of Int'l Organizations
articles.content:
New Year Cards to Kim Jong Un from Foreign State and Party Leaders, Personages of Int'l Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received New Year cards from state and party leaders of different countries and personages of international organizations on the occasion of the New Year.
					 They are presidents of Bangladesh, Pakistan, the State of Palestine, Turkmenistan, Azerbaijan, Tunisia, Algeria and Angola, the king of the Principality of Monaco, captains regent of the Republic of San Marino and presidents of Guinea, Rwanda, Equatorial Guinea and Guyana and their wives.
					
					 They also include the Communist Party of Canada (Marxist-Leninist), the general chairwoman and the general secretary of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, the general secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of India (Marxist), the general secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of Portugal, the prime minister of Thailand, the secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council, the co-chairman of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, the director general of the UN Office at Vienna and the chief of the Regional Office for South-East Asia of the WHO.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea received New Year cards from the C.C., People's Party of Cambodia, the C.C., Revolutionary Communist Party of France, the chairman of the FUNCINPEC Party of Cambodia and the secretary general of the People's Party for Reconstruction and Democracy of DR Congo.

articles.title: Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Pays Homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Pays Homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- An art troupe of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star led by Jang Ki Saeng visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill here on Wednesday.
					 The members of the art troupe laid a bouquet before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Third Enlarged Plenary Meeting of Sixth C.C., SWUK Held
articles.content:
Third Enlarged Plenary Meeting of Sixth C.C., SWUK Held
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The third enlarged plenary meeting of the Sixth Central Committee of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea (SWUK) took place here on Wednesday.
					 Members and alternate members of the C.C., the women's union and its officials attended the meeting.
					
					 The plenary meeting discussed the issue of carrying through the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					  A report was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers called upon all the officials and members of the women's union to vigorously turn out in the all-out general offensive this year to win bigger victory under the brilliant blueprint for building a socialist power unrolled by the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 They called for fully performing the responsibility and duty in the struggle to realize the ideal and dream of the people this year.
					
					 The meeting discussed an organizational issue.
					
					 Kim Jong Sun was relieved of her post and Jang Chun Sil was elected as chairwoman of the C.C., SWUK.

articles.title: School Youth and Children Start Study Tour of Kim Jong Il's Birthplace
articles.content:
School Youth and Children Start Study Tour of Kim Jong Il's Birthplace
 Hyesan, February 1 (KCNA) -- School youth and children from across the country began their study tour of leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the secret camp in Mt Paektu on the occasion of his 75th birth anniversary.
					 A kick-off ceremony took place before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province on Wednesday.
					
					 The participants in the study tour laid a floral basket and bouquets at the statues of the great leaders.
					
					 A report and speeches were made at the event.
					
					 They called on the study tour makers to deeply grasp the revolutionary history and feats of the peerlessly great men recorded in the revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites in the area of Mt Paektu.
					
					 They declared that the study tour would mark an important occasion in preparing themselves to be persons of idea and faith who are ready to defend respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un politically and ideologically and at the cost of their lives.
					
					 They stressed the need to study hard under the slogan "Studying is also a battle!" and do good things and briskly conduct mass-based culture and art activities.
					
					 After the ceremony, the study tour makers marched for Pochonbo.
					
					 People from all walks of life and school youth and children in Hyesan City warmly saw them off.

articles.title: Paektusan Prize Sports Games Opens
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize Sports Games Opens
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Prize Sports Games was opened with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street here Wednesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Vice-Premier Ri Ryong Nam, officials concerned and sportspersons.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, there took place a premier basketball men's match between Amnokgang and Kigwancha sports teams.
					
					 Participants in the games will compete in football, basketball, volleyball, table tennis, handball, ice hockey and other events in Pyongyang, Sariwon, Kowon and the sports village in the area of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: Construction of Samjiyon County Progresses Apace in DPRK
articles.content:
Construction of Samjiyon County Progresses Apace in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- It has been pushed forward in the DPRK to turn the Samjiyon County in Ryanggang Province into a model county of the country. 
					 The county is the native place of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The field headquarters of 216 Division has set the Hyesan-Samjiyon broad-gauge railway as a main thrust for making a breakthrough in the construction of Samjiyon area and paid primary efforts to it, while speeding up the construction of major projects.
					
					 The Hyesan-Samjiyon Railway Construction Brigade has stepped up the construction of railway tunnels, railroad bed, revetments, railway stations and dwelling houses.
					
					 The Paektusan Hero Youth Brigade has begun building or remodeling buildings including Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouse.
					
					 And the Construction Brigade 618 is pushing ahead with laying a foundation for the Paektusan Museum and constructing building-fixtures factory and the Ryanggang Provincial Brigade is making full preparations for the construction of the Potato Starch Factory.
					
					 Meanwhile, designing of green buildings to be built in tablelands is gaining momentum.

articles.title: Fructose Starch Syrup, Natural Health Foodstuff
articles.content:
Fructose Starch Syrup, Natural Health Foodstuff
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- A number of natural health foodstuffs has been produced in the DPRK. One of them is fructose starch syrup.
					 This fructose starch syrup is an organic health food, which raises the pharmacological action of fructo-oligosaccharide extracted from natural plant and satisfies the food safety condition. It also contains essential amino acids, vitamins, mineral matters and macro micronutrients.
					
					 The syrup can be taken at any time.
					
					 With its high pharmacological effects, it is popular among people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Reviving June 15 Era of Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Reviving June 15 Era of Reunification 
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article calls for reviving the trend of the June 15 era of reunification and giving steady continuity to it by demonstrating the patriotic will for reunification of all Koreans once again. 
					 The June 15 era of reunification was marked with days of joy and excitement as Koreans were improving the north-south relations and paving the road of independent reunification, peace and prosperity by pooling their will and efforts in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself under the banner of the north-south declarations, the article says, adding:
					
					 The north-south summit was held in Pyongyang in June Juche 89 (2000) for the first time in the history of national division and the June 15 joint declaration adopted. This ushered in the era of By Our Nation Itself, a new era of independent reunification.
					
					 In hearty response to the historic June 15 joint declaration reflecting the will of the nation for independent reunification, all Koreans turned out in the patriotic struggle to terminate the history of distrust and confrontation and achieve the country's reunification, full of confidence and optimism. 
					
					 The movement for national reunification developed into a nation-wide movement with all Koreans involved, irrespective of authorities and NGOs and differences in ideology, political view, faction and party affiliation.
					
					 At a time when the north-south relations were put into the orbit of improvement after terminating the repetition of the vicious cycle of confrontation, talks between authorities were steadily held and there took place eye-opening events, something beyond imagination before. 
					
					 Severed railways and roads were reconnected, air and sea routes opened and cooperation and exchange in various fields conducted between the north and the south, pleasing the compatriots desirous of reunification.
					
					 In order to improve the inter-Korean relations, it is necessary to dynamically revive the trend of the June 15 era of reunification under the uplifted banner of the three principles of national reunification and the north-south declarations.

articles.title: Japan's Crimes during "Resident-General's Rule" over Korea Disclosed
articles.content:
Japan's Crimes during "Resident-General's Rule" over Korea Disclosed
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Newspapers Wednesday carry articles contributed by researchers at the Institute for Japan Studies to disclose the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists, on the lapse of 111 years since their establishment of the "residency-general", an organ for their colonial rule over Korea.
					 Ra Myong Song, a researcher of the institute, in an article carried by Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The Japanese imperialists fabricated the "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty" through threats, blackmail, pressure and fraud under the spurious signboard of "protection." Pursuant to it, they formally established the "residency-general in Korea" in Seoul on February 1, 1906, enforcing the "resident-general's rule."
					
					 The establishment of the "residency-general" and its rule were, in essence, aimed to wantonly violate the sovereignty and dignity of Korea and pursue a colonial rule over it.
					
					 The "resident-general" was the supreme ruler who deprived Korea of all rights such as legislation, jurisdiction, administration and military command.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists set up a "mechanism for controlling the residency-general and governor's office," empowering the "resident-general" to exercise the same rights as the governor general's. The "resident-general" belonged directly to the Japanese king and he was authorized to suspend the enforcement of laws and treaties related to diplomatic issues in Korea and rescind them on behalf of the Japanese government. He was mandated to promulgate "ordinances of the residency-general" to detain Koreans and issue an order to use force of arms, etc.
					
					 The supreme ruler of Korea was not the emperor of the Korean feudal government but the "resident-general" of Japan and the ruling organ was not the Korean feudal government but the "residency-general" of Japan.
					
					 Kim Hong Hwi, a researcher of the same institute, in an article contributed to Minju Joson, discloses that the Japanese imperialists enforced "the resident-general's rule," keeping Korea under their military occupation with huge aggressor forces present and establishing a brutal gendarme and police system to mercilessly crack down even the slightest anti-Japanese elements.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Assails S. Korean Warmongers' Saber-rattling
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Assails S. Korean Warmongers' Saber-rattling
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Days ago the south Korean warmongers established the "Center to Cope with WMD" in the Joint Chiefs of Staff and started its full operation. It was reported that a similar machine would be set up at the puppet Defense Ministry of south Korea within the first half of this year.
					 Meanwhile, they staged a madcap "missile warning drill" together with the U.S. and Japan as part of the above-said plan. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 They are grave military provocations to the DPRK and unpardonable acts of disturbing peace and deliberately aggravating the situation on the Korean Peninsula and in the region as they are part of the premeditated preparations for preemptive attack on the DPRK. 
					
					 The south Korean warmongers are trumpeting about promoting cooperation with the U.S. and Japan in missile defence, ballyhooing about "development of weapons for proper counteraction" and "practical counteraction strategy". However, they are nothing but ridiculous moves. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are now following the evermore undisguised moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group for a nuclear war with the utmost vigilance.
					
					 Unshakable are the faith and will of the DPRK to wipe out to the last man the outside forces and the group of traitors bringing the danger of a nuclear war to the inviolable land of Korea and root out the source of war.
					
					 The DPRK once again solemnly warns the south Korean warmongers going hysteric with the war moves against it that they will not be able to escape a merciless punishment.

articles.title: S. Koreans Stage Action against THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Koreans Stage Action against THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Inhabitants in Songju County, North Kyongsang Province of south Korea held a candlelight rally against THAAD deployment outside the county office on Jan. 28, according to the south Korean Internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 At the rally, speakers recalled that 200 days have passed since the candlelight action was staged in protest against the choice of Songju as the site for THAAD deployment and there have taken place candlelight actions every day.
					
					 The THAAD deployment in south Korea is designed to deteriorate the inter-Korean relations and bring benefits to the U.S. only, they held.
					
					 Such war weapons as THAAD should be removed and peace achieved, they said, calling for sustained struggle.

articles.title: S. Korea: Hwang Kyo An Urged to Step down
articles.content:
S. Korea: Hwang Kyo An Urged to Step down
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo on Jan. 30 carried an editorial urging Hwang Kyo An not to dream of becoming "president" but make an apology and step down at once.
					 Accusing Hwang of behaving as if he were "president", the editorial took issue with the contents of his speech made at the press conference held on the New Year.
					
					 Hwang made public the "state administration" plan which preserves the keynote of policy of the Park Geun Hye regime including moves for THAAD deployment and released an unprecedented number of persons on parole on the New Year, revealing his ulterior motive, the editorial said, adding:
					
					 Hwang Kyo An is a typical man to be ousted together with Park Geun Hye.
					
					 He should not dream of becoming "president" but immediately make an apology and step down. He will face a heavier punishment by history for any delay in stepping down.

articles.title: Release of Victims of Case of Attempted Rebellion and Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Release of Victims of Case of Attempted Rebellion and Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of People reported that more than 1,000 citizens from Seoul, Taejon and North and South Jolla provinces, south Korean Kangwon Province and other parts of south Korea held a rally in front of the Suwon Detention House in Kyonggi Province on Jan. 30 in demand of the release of the victims of the fabricated case of attempted rebellion and prisoners of conscience.
					 At the rally, speakers contended that Park Geun Hye, an arch criminal who abused power, and her servants should be thrown into prison, adding that the first task for combating the deep-rooted evils is to scrap undemocratic laws including the "security law".
					
					 They stressed the need to struggle against the regime's racket for "eliminating followers of the north" in order to throw overboard the forces pushing the situation to the brink of war.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Disseminated among Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Disseminated among Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held a New Year gathering with heads of various compatriot organizations in Shenyang of China on January 20 to give an explanation of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 Present there were Chairperson Choe Un Bok and other officials of the General Association and Koreans in China.
					
					 Speaking at the gathering, Choe Un Bok briefed the heads of compatriot organizations on the content of Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					
					 She said that Kim Jong Un ardently called for opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans this year, clearly indicating the way for Korea's reunification, the common desire of the nation.
					
					 Last year witnessed the closer national unity among Koreans in China through solidarity activities between the General Association and various compatriot organizations, she noted, ardently calling upon all the compatriots to always share the breath with the people in the homeland and make tangible contributions to the prosperity and reunification of the homeland.
					
					 Then heads of compatriot organizations made speeches at the gathering.
					
					 The participants enjoyed themselves, watching an art performance and dancing to the tune of songs.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Hungary
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Hungary 
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- A Hungarian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, was formed in Budapest on Jan. 23.
					 Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from January 24 to April 17 and decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary careers and exploits of the great leaders and organize diverse political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- A Partizansk city, Maritime Territory of Russia, preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, was formed on January 23.
					 Khmelyov, first secretary of the Partizansk City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is member of the Legislative Assembly of Maritime Territory of Russia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the days from January 23 to April 15 as a celebration period and decided to organize political and cultural events praising the revolutionary careers and exploits of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu in the period.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Germany
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Germany
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee of the Communist Party of Germany for celebrating the birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star) of leader Kim Jong Il was formed on January 23.
					 Torsten Schoevitz, chairman of the Communist Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from January 23 to February 16 and decided to organize a seminar, a meeting, round-table talks and other political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il in the period.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Support Korean People's Struggle for National Reunification
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Support Korean People's Struggle for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on January 21 in support of the appeal adopted at the joint conference of the DPRK's government, political parties and organizations.
					 Referring to the detailed content of the appeal, the statement said:
					
					 The joint conference in Pyongyang stressed the need to step up the nationwide grand march towards reunification by the concerted efforts of the nation, true to the important tasks set forth by Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 We fully support the appeal adopted at the joint conference of the DPRK's government, political parties and organizations and will extend encouragement to the struggle of the Korean people for national reunification.

articles.title: Efectuada reunion ampliada de 3o pleno del 6o periodo del CC de USMC
articles.content:
Efectuada reunion ampliada de 3o pleno del 6o periodo del CC de USMC
Pyongyang, primero de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia primero en esta capital la reunion ampliada del tercer pleno del sexto periodo del Comite Central de la Union Socialista de Mujeres de Corea (USMC).
					En la ocasion tomaron parte las miembros y miembros suplentes del CC de la USMC y las funcionarias de la misma entidad.
					
					En la cita se discutieron las medidas para materializar a toda costa las tareas presentadas en el mensaje del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un pronunciado con motivo del Ano Nuevo.
					
					Hubo informe e intervenciones en la ocasion.
					
					Las oradoras llamaron a todas las funcionarias y miembros de la Union de Mujeres a movilizarse este ano en la ofensiva general de todo el pueblo, orientada a lograr mayor victoria segun el diseno maravilloso de construccion de la potencia socialista que presento el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Exhortaron a cumplir con su responsabilidad y deber en la lucha por hacer realidad este ano el ideal y sueno del pueblo.
					
					Quedo discutido el problema de organizacion.
					
					La presidenta Kim Jong Sun fue removida del cargo y Jang Chun Sil fue elegida como nueva presidenta.

articles.title: Iniciada marcha de jovenes y escolares a la casa natal de Kim Jong Il en el monte Paektu
articles.content:
Iniciada marcha de jovenes y escolares a la casa natal de Kim Jong Il en el monte Paektu
Hyesan, primero de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 75o aniversario del natalicio del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il, se inicio la marcha de los jovenes y ninos escolares hacia su casa natal en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu.
					La ceremonia de partida tuvo lugar el dia primero en el patio de educacion frente a las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en la ciudad de Hyesan de la provincia de Ryanggang. 
					
					Los participantes rindieron homenaje a los Generalisimos tras colocar cestos y ramos de flores al pie de sus estatuas de bronce. 
					
					En el acto hubo informe e intervenciones. 
					
					Los oradores dijeron que a traves de la marcha, todos los participantes deben asimilar profundamente la historia y proezas revolucionarias de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu impregnadas en los campos de batalla revolucionaria y los lugares de interes historico-revolucionario en la misma zona. 
					
					Insistieron en la necesidad de convertir la marcha en un motivo importante para prepararse como los fuertes en la ideologia y conviccion que defiendan en lo ideo-politico y a riesgo de la vida al Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Expusieron la decision de estudiar con afan bajo la consigna de "!El estudio es tambien un combate!", buscar los trabajos utiles y dinamizar las actividades culturales y artisticas masivas. 
					
					Terminado el acto, los participantes comenzaron la marcha hacia Pochonbo.
					
					Les despidieron los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares de la ciudad de Hyesan.

articles.title: Se impulsa remozamiento del distrito de Samjiyon
articles.content:
Se impulsa remozamiento del distrito de Samjiyon
Pyongyang, primero de febrero (ACNC) -- El distrito de Samjiyon de la provincia de Ryanggang es la tierra natal del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y cuna espiritual del pueblo coreano.
					Ultimamente, se impulsa el remozamiento del distrito como el paradigma del pais.
					
					La comandancia conjunta en el terreno de la Division de Construccion 216 concede prioridad a la obra de ancha ferrovia Hyesan-Samjiyon definiendola como tarea principal e impulsa a la vez la edificacion de objetos importantes.
					
					La brigada de construccion de ancha ferrovia adscrita a la division planea terminar en el invierno la construccion de tunel, asiento de durmientes y muro de contencion y acelerar desde la primavera la edificacion de terminales ferroviarias y viviendas. 
					
					Los regimientos adscritos a la brigada dan acicate al apisonamiento de asiento de durmientes y el ordenamiento de pendientes.
					
					La brigada jovenes heroes Paektusan comenzo la reconstruccion o la remodelacion de los edificios como el invernadero de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia.
					
					La brigada de construccion 618 lleva adelante la obra de cimentacion del Museo Universal Paektusan y la edificacion de la base de produccion intermedia de materiales de construccion de acabado. 
					
					La brigada de la provincia de Ryanggang, encargada de la edificacion de la fabrica de harina de patata, asegura las condiciones para el comienzo decisivo de su tarea. 
					
					Estan en marcha los preparativos para disenar los edificios verdes que convengan a las condiciones climaticas y caracteristicas topograficas de la zona alpina.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a belicistas surcoreanos que persiguen guerra anti-Norte
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a belicistas surcoreanos que persiguen guerra anti-Norte
Pyongyang, primero de febrero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, los titeres surcoreanos instauraron en la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor el "centro de reaccion a las armas de exterminio masivo" que entro ya en la operacion. Se dice que el mismo aparato se instalara en el Ministerio de Defensa Nacional dentro del primer semestre de este ano.
					Por otra parte, ellos realizaron con EE.UU. y Japon el "entrenamiento de alarma de misiles".
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual divulgado el dia primero, condena que esos movimientos significan los preparativos para el ataque preventivo contra el Norte (de Corea) siendo grave provocacion militar que exacerba intencionalmente la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					Es ridiculo el comportamiento de los titeres surcoreanos que promueven con sus patrones EE.UU. y Japon la cooperacion de defensa antimisiles hablando tanto del "desarrollo de armas de enfrentamiento apropiado" y la "estrategia de enfrentamiento practico", comienza el comentario y prosigue:
					
					Ahora, nuestro ejercito y pueblo observan atentamente la cada vez mas abierta campana del imperialismo norteamericano y los titeres surcoreanos para provocar la guerra nuclear.
					
					Son firmes nuestra conviccion y voluntad de erradicar la causa de guerra al aniquilar a las fuerzas extranjeras y todos los traidores a la nacion que intentan provocar la guerra nuclear en el sagrado territorio patrio.
					
					Advertimos de nuevo y seriamente a los belicistas surcoreanos que si quieren buscar la guerra anti-Norte, seran castigados implacablemente.
